definition: decoration/ornament/to decorate/to adorn/to hide/to conceal (a fault)/excuse (to hide a fault)/to play a role (in opera)/to impersonate

sentences.english: Has its own decoration of the times, it was a reflection of social and cultural.
sentences.chinese: 紋飾本身有它的時代性，它是當時社會文化的反映。

sentences.english: The third section discusses the cultural meaning of the Han Mirror.
sentences.chinese: 第三章探討了漢鏡紋飾的文化內涵。

sentences.english: The grain decoration on his head comes from the lotus pattern on Song pottery.
sentences.chinese: 他的頭部紋飾源自宋瓷上的蓮花瓣造型。

sentences.english: The ornamentation of extine is reticulate, reticulate- microperforate or microperforate.
sentences.chinese: 外壁紋飾網狀，某些種尚具或爲細小的穿孔。

sentences.english: There were so many musical instruments of Shang dynasty unearthed and most of which had decorative patterns of gulosity on their surfaces.
sentences.chinese: 商代出土樂器衆多，其紋飾則以饕餮紋樣爲主導。

sentences.english: I consider the style and design of your tie as most suitable for your suit.
sentences.chinese: 我認爲您的領帶的式樣和紋飾最配您的西服。

sentences.english: Here refers to the meaning of grain first refers to the established traditional meaning.
sentences.chinese: 這裏所指紋飾的含義首要是指約定俗成的傳統含義。

sentences.english: The surface ornament of seed is reticulate or mammilate.
sentences.chinese: 種子表面紋飾爲網狀或乳突狀。

sentences.english: A vase with a similar pattern flanked by a pair of ruyi-cloud handles is in the Palace Museum in Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 北京故宮博物院藏有一造型和紋飾類似的青花雙耳瓶。

sentences.english: On the left front edge was placed the clavus , insignia of high dignitaries.
sentences.chinese: 人前邊緣有一塊體現地位的紋飾。

sentences.english: The teak table has fluted legs.
sentences.chinese: 這張柚木桌子的桌腿有凹槽紋飾。

sentences.english: Also found were a number of ceramic items, finely decorated with geometric patterns.
sentences.chinese: 另外還有許多有幾何圖案精細紋飾的陶器。

sentences.english: RESULTS There were significant differences in characters of seeds surface of Radix astragali and its familiar adulterants.
sentences.chinese: 結果黃芪種子及僞品的種子皮紋飾有明顯差異。

sentences.english: Roma, your cannon barrels have wonderful detail. Did you buy them? Make them?
sentences.chinese: 您的炮管有漂亮紋飾。你是買的嗎？製作的？

sentences.english: The dragon column on the 2nd floor is vigorous in posture, with smooth decorative outline.
sentences.chinese: 第二層之蟠龍柱，體態雄健，紋飾線條流暢。

sentences.english: In the Larix Mill, there are evident differences between two groups on the seed coat ornamentation.
sentences.chinese: 該屬內兩個組的種皮紋飾存在明顯差異。

definition: line (in drawing, calligraphy etc)/the lines or contours of a three-dimensional object (hairstyle, clothing, car etc)
vein lines (in marble or fingerprint)/grain (in wood etc)
(of sb or sth) whole or entire body
bronze implement/refers to ancient bronze artifacts, from c. 2,000 BC
